site.name: StreamHub Leads
site.description: Your ultimate destination for IPTV streaming. Explore our plans and join the streaming revolution.

hero.title: Experience the Future of Television
hero.subtitle: High-quality streaming, thousands of channels, and unparalleled support. All in one place.

items.title: Global Access
items.description: Watch your favorite content from anywhere in the world. All you need is an internet connection.

items.title: 4K & HD Quality
items.description: Enjoy crystal-clear picture quality with our extensive library of 4K and HD channels.

items.title: Multi-Device Support
items.description: Stream on your TV, computer, tablet, or smartphone. We support all major devices.

items.title: 99.9% Uptime
items.description: Our robust infrastructure ensures you have a stable and reliable viewing experience, 24/7.

items.title: Thousands of Channels
items.description: Your IPTV subscription offers you international IPTV channels from around the world, including all major worldwide channels.

items.title: Video On Demand
items.description: Stream full seasons of the top TV shows, the latest hit movies, children's shows and everything else you want from the comprehensive VOD library.

items.title: Watch on Any Device
items.description: Our IPTV streaming works on devices such as Smart TVs, Android, Amazon Fire Stick, KODI, MAG and anything else that supports M3U or portals.

items.title: World Class Support
items.description: We offer in-depth tutorials and client support to make installation, and streaming amazingly quick and simple, no matter where you are in the world.

items.title: Safe & Secure Payment
items.description: Secure Payments - No complicated billing processes required.

items.title: 7-Day Money-Back Guarantee
items.description: If you feel our services is not a good fit, we will grant you a full refund.

items.name: Alex Johnson
items.quote: The channel selection is incredible, and the 4K quality is breathtaking. I've never had a better streaming experience.

items.name: Maria Garcia
items.quote: I can watch every game, from any league, live. The service is reliable and the support team is super helpful.

items.name: David Smith
items.quote: There's something for everyone in the family. The kids love the cartoons, and we love the movie channels. Highly recommended!

cta.subtitle: Choose a plan that fits your needs and start streaming today. Instant activation, no hidden fees.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to ask.

staticQuestions.question: What is IPTV?
staticQuestions.answer: IPTV stands for Internet Protocol Television. It's a service that delivers television content over the internet, instead of through traditional satellite or cable formats.

staticQuestions.question: What devices are supported?
staticQuestions.answer: We support a wide range of devices including Smart TVs, Android boxes, Amazon Fire Stick, MAG devices, PC/Mac, and smartphones (iOS/Android).

staticQuestions.question: Can I watch on multiple devices at once?
staticQuestions.answer: Yes, depending on your plan. Our plans come with a specific number of allowed simultaneous connections. For example, the Standard plan allows for 3 connections at the same time.

staticQuestions.question: Is there a free trial?
staticQuestions.answer: We occasionally offer trial periods. Please contact our support team to inquire about current trial availability and offers.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.success: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you shortly.
